name: IDPay Payment Gateway For LearnPress
author: IDPay

sections.description:
After installing and enabling this plugin, your customers can pay through IDPay gateway.
For doing a transaction through IDPay gateway,
you must have an API Key.
You can obtain the API Key by going to your dashboard in your
IDPay account.

1.1.0, Nov 13, 2022

  • Tested Up With WordPress 6.1 And LearnPress 4.1.7.3.2
  • Check Double Spending Correct
  • Check Does Not Xss Attack Correct
  • First Official Release

1.0.1, October 19, 2020

  • Support GET method in Callback.

1.0.0, July 14, 2020

  • Develope release.
sections.installation:
1. After creating a web service on https://idpay.ir and getting an API Key, follow this instruction:
  2. Activate plugin IDPay for LearnPress.
  3. Go tho LearnPress > Settings > Payments Gateways.
  4. Enable IDPay payment gateway.
  5. Go to Manage.
  6. Enter the API Key.
  • If you need to use this plugin in Test mode, check the “Sandbox”.
